title: Mother
body:
Unnh...
<<if !visited("Mother.TookAllFood")>>
    <<if visited("Mother.TakeFruit") && visited("Mother.TakePie")>>
        [[Mother.TookAllFood]]
    <<endif>>
    -> What is wrong?
        My kid and I don't have anything to eat. Everything has rotted away.
        If you could find something to eat for us, we would be thankful forever.
        I've been thinking about maybe fruit..
    -> I found a fruit for you! <<if $rottenApple && !visited("Mother.TakeFruit")>>
        [[Mother.TakeFruit]]
    -> I got you a pie! <<if visited("Waitress.GivePie") && !visited("Mother.TakePie")>>
        [[Mother.TakePie]]
<<else>>
    Please go away...
<<endif>>

title: Mother.TakeFruit
body:
Thanksss....
It's spoiled... very much.
I really can't eat this.
<<if visited("Mother.TakePie")>>
    [[Mother.TookAllFood]]
<<else>>
    Can you try to get us something more edible?
<<endif>>

title: Mother.TakePie
body:
This isn't bakery!
This is solid gold.
Do you want us to starve?
<<if visited("Mother.TakePie")>>
    [[Mother.TookAllFood]]
<<else>>
    Can you try to get us something more edible?
<<endif>>

title: Mother.TookAllFood
body:
I mean we are obviously very thankful for your services.
I'm sure we won't need your help again!
